dcterms:description: A large dataset containing 5 million product title-image pairs used for contrastive learning to enhance internal alignment of products.
dcterms:title: Product title-image pairs

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1.3 million <query, title, image> positive pairs sampled from the online clicking log of Miravia Search, used for external alignment between user queries and products.
dcterms:title: <query, title, image> positive pairs from Miravia Search

dcterms:description: A labeled dataset containing 200,000 <query, title, image> triplet data, with 30,000 samples selected as the evaluation set, where the ratio of positive to negative is 1:1.
dcterms:title: Labeled <query, title, image> data
